abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Highway Project will comprise:
            (a) reconstruction of the Aneho-Tabligbo to two-lane paved
            standards (45 km); (b) construction to gravel standards of
            the Agou-Notse road (51 km); (c) purchase of road
            maintenance and workshop equipment; (d) provision of
            technical assistance to PWD for road maintenance and road
            planning and design, and to the MCT for overall transport
            planning and coordination (e) studies for improving
            CFT's operations, and for organizing feeder roads
            construction and maintenance; and (f) pre-investment studies
            of the Bassar-Mango road (137 km).
